definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州

sentences.english: Our 120 sauvignon Blanc is crispy and medium bodied.
sentences.chinese: 我們的120白蘇維翁清爽，中度酒體。

sentences.english: Oh yes, that's a New Zealand Sauvignon Blanc.
sentences.chinese: 是的，那是新西蘭的白蘇維濃。

sentences.english: Female divers of the Jeju Islands. Image by Brenda Paik Suno.
sentences.chinese: 濟州島的女性撈海者，圖由白蘇諾攝。

sentences.english: The mineral character of the Sauvignon is supported by the round finesse of Chardonnay.
sentences.chinese: 白蘇維翁典型的礦物質氣息被莎當妮的圓潤所包容。
